job_purpose: Shape and deliver the Artificial Intelligence strategy, contribute to sourcing, design, implementation, and support of AI and Machine Learning solutions, integrate AI into processes, identify high-value use cases, and ensure smooth adoption.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Analyse and map existing workflows for automation
Collaborate with internal teams and external vendors for AI model design and integration
Propose enhancements using generative AI and data-led solutions
Recommend and implement fit-for-purpose AI tools
required_qualifications: Certifications in AI product management or machine learning
Hands-on experience with data integration, transformation, and storage
Experience with Azure technologies including Cognitive Services, Machine Learning, Data Factory, and Microsoft Co-pilot
Strong interest and foundational knowledge in AI concepts (ML, deep learning, NLP)
company_details: Founded in 2001, the company simplifies wealth management for leading institutions and private wealth firms through cutting-edge technology. They offer a fully integrated investment platform for managing portfolios. The company values effective wealth management and aims to redefine the industry.
